src_original: Wal_4.7 atha mārasya pāpīyasa etad abhavat parinirvāsyate śramaṇo gautama iti viditvā duḥkhī durmanā vipratisārī tatraivāṁtarhitaḥ / Section 5
tgt_original: 」時彼天魔聞佛語已，知不涅槃，心生懊惱，於是天魔慚恥而退。

src_original: Wal_5.1 atha śakro devendro bhagavato vātābādhikaṁ glānyam utpannaṁ viditvā yasyā jaṁbvā nāmnā jaṁbudvīpaś ca prajñāyate tasyā nātidūre mahad dharītakīvanaṁ tato harītakīr varṇagandharasopetā ādāya yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma / upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā
tgt_original: 爾時帝釋天主遙知世尊體發風病，自天而下至贍部洲，去菩提樹不近不遠，有大訶梨勒林於中而住； 於此林中取得上好訶梨勒已，疾往佛所。

src_original: vanditvaikānte asthād / Wal_5.2 ekāntasthitaḥ śakro devendro bhagavantam idam avocat / ihāhaṁ bhadaṁta bhagavato
tgt_original: 到佛所已，頭面著地，禮世尊足，禮已瞻仰住立一面，白言：

src_original: vātābādhikaṁ glānyam utpannaṁ viditvā yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambudvīpaḥ prajñāyate tasyā nātidūre mahad dharītakīvanaṁ tato mayā harītakyo varṇagandharasopetā ānītās tā bhagavān
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 我知聖體小有風病，此贍部洲有訶梨勒，色妙馨香，可療斯恙，我今持來奉上世尊，唯願大慈納受而食。

src_original: paribhuṅktāṁ tā bhagavatā paribhuktā vātaṁ cānulomayiṣyanti vātābādhikaṁ ca glānyaṁ praśamayiṣyanti / Wal_5.3 tā bhagavān paribhuktavāṁ bhagavatā paribhuktā vātaṁ cānulomayanti vātābādhikaṁ ca glānyaṁ praśamayanti tena bhagavataḥ kṣamaṇīyataraṁ cābhūd yāpanīyataraṁ ca /
tgt_original: 」世尊受已尋便服食，風病即除，體安如故。

src_original: Section 7 Wal_7.1 atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṁ mucalindasya nāgarājasya bhavane viḥrtya yena bodhimūlaṁ tenopajagāma / Wal_7.2 upetya prajñapta eva tṛṇasaṁstarake niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṁkam ābhujya ṛjuṁ kāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukho smṛtim upasthāpya saptāham ekaparyaṁkenātināmayati idam evaṁ dvādaśāṅgaṁ pratītyasamutpādam anulomaṁ pratilomaṁ vyavalokayan /
tgt_original: 」爾時世尊說是伽陀答龍王已，即離彼處還來菩提樹下，結跏趺坐經七晝夜，入定觀察十二緣生，云何根本而因得生？ 所謂：

src_original: Wal_7.3 yad utāsmin satīdaṁ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārāḥ saṁskārapratyayaṁ vijñānaṁ vijñānapratyayaṁ nāmarūpam nāmarūpapratyayaṁ ṣaḍāyatanaṁ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upadānam upādānapratyayo bhavo bhavapratyayā jātir jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ
tgt_original: 因於無明乃緣於行，行緣識，識緣名色，名色緣六入，六入緣觸，觸緣受，受緣愛，愛緣取，取緣有，有緣生，生緣老死憂悲苦惱；

src_original: saṁbhavaṁty evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
tgt_original: 由如是因，得一大苦蘊集如是。

src_original: saṁskāranirodhaḥ saṁskāranirodhād vijñānanirodho vijñānanirodhān nāmarūpanirodho nāmarūpanirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ ṣaḍāyatananirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ sparśanirodhād vedanānirodho vedanānirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhas tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodha upādānanirodhād bhavanirodho bhavanirodhāj jātinirodho jātinirodhāj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā
tgt_original: 無明滅即行滅，行滅即識滅，識滅即名色滅，名色滅即六入滅，六入滅即觸滅，觸滅即受滅，受滅即愛滅，愛滅即取滅，取滅即有滅，有滅即生滅，生滅即老死憂悲苦惱滅；

src_original: nirudhyante evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
tgt_original: 解如是滅，則得一大苦蘊滅。

src_original: Wal_7.5 atha bhagavāṁs tasyaiva saptāhasyātyayāt tasmāt samādher vyutthāya tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthā babhāṣe /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊於七晝夜在於禪定，如是觀察十二緣生已，乃出三摩地而說伽陀曰：

src_original: Wal_9.10 atha bhagavata etad abhavat / kutra nu paṁcakā bhikṣava etarhi viharaṁti / adrākṣīd bhagavān divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa paṁcakā bhikṣavo bārāṇasyāṁ viharanti
tgt_original: 」於是以淨天眼觀在何處。 見彼五人在波羅奈國鹿野苑中，於是世尊自菩提樹，往波羅奈國鹿野之苑。

src_original: ṛṣivadane ṁrgadāpe / Wal_9.11 ḍṛṣṭvā ca punar yathābhiramyaṁ bodhimūle vihṛtya yena bārāṇasī kāśīnāṁ nigamas tena caryāṁ prakrāntaḥ Section 10 Wal_10.1 tena khalu samayena upaga ājīvikas tasminn eva mārge ’dhvapratipanno ’bhūt / adrākṣīd upaga ājīvako bhagavantaṁ dūrata eva / ḍṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha /
tgt_original: 時於路次，有一仙人名烏波誐，相逆而來。 時彼仙人忽於路次得見世尊，又見身長丈六，金色晃然，相好端嚴殊特超世，驚歎良久乃作是言：

src_original: Wal_10.2 viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautama indriyāṇi pariśuddho mukhavaṛṇa paryavadātaś chavivarṇaḥ kas te āyuṣman gautama śāstā kaṁ vāsy uddiśya pravrajitaḥ kasya vā dharmaṁ rocayasi /
tgt_original: 「瞿曇！ 覩汝相好，湛然清淨，復如金色，非世所同。 何因出家？ 歸依何法？ 誰為汝師？

src_original: Wal_10.3 atha bhagavāṁs tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthā babhāṣe /
tgt_original: 今復何去？ 」爾時世尊乃說伽陀，答仙人曰：

src_original: Wal_11.1 atha bhagavāṁ kāśiṣu janapadeṣu caryāṁ caran bārāṇasīṁ gataḥ / Wal_11.2 tena khalu samayena paṁcakā bhikṣavo bārāṇasyāṁ viharaṁti ṛṣivadane mṛgadāpe /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊即自往彼波羅奈國鹿野之苑，時彼五人，其名：

src_original: Wal_11.3 adrākṣuḥ paṁcakā bhikṣavo bhagavantaṁ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar anyonyaṁ saṁpratasthur kriyākāraṁś cākāṛsuḥ /
tgt_original: 彼五人等遙見世尊，知非他人，皆大驚怪，互相議曰：

src_original: Wal_11.5 so ’smābhir upasaṁkrāṁto nābhivādayitavyo na vanditavyaḥ notthāyāsanenopanimaṁtrayitavyaḥ
Wal_11.6 yathā yathā bhagavāṁ paṁcakāṁ bhikṣūṁ darśanāyopasaṁkrāmati tathā tathā pañcakā bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ śriyaṁ ca tejaś ca gauravaṁ cāsahamānā utthāyāsanād ekatyā bhagavato ’rthāyāsanaṁ
tgt_original: 時五人等見佛俯近威德加臨，無能安坐，皆起迎侍，於是五人咸言：
